chunk_prompt: Create a coherent summary about Topic: er, infection, like:
final_prompt: Create a coherent summary about Topic: er, infection, like:

sentences.text: If you were inhaling at all when the accident happened you could have burned the inside of your throat.
Most of these people feel fine directly following the accident and end up intubated.
Most people present with normal breathing, but as the injured tissues swell, it can close the airway.
one pupil is dilated while the other is normal.
figured needed antibiotics, so made an appointment with doctor.
mom said it’s serious and if can’t see the doctor that same day then need to go to urgent care.
When rolled sleeve all the way up they saw red streaks going from the infected area up towards arm pit.
Red streaks near a wound, particularly on the limbs, can indicate a spreading infection and may be an early sign of sepsis.
If you notice a red spot on one breast that isn’t going away, if you have new orange-peel-like dimpling, or one breast appears swollen, any of those can be a sign of inflammatory breast cancer.

If you notice a red spot on one breast that isn’t going away, if you have new orange-pe.

sentences.text: no typical signs just a severe headache then a bloodshot eye with the first.
sudden hearing loss in one ear.
sudden onset dementia, especially in old women and diaper wearers, might be the only symptom of a bladder infection.
went months without going to the er because thought was being dramatic.
losing your period or prolonged amenorrhea is oftentimes a sign of something larger going on.
